name: GL Associates
overview:
GL Associates provides consulting services for JD Edwards, Oracle and PeopleSoft ERP systems to a worldwide client base.

ERP Systems GL Associates offers services and tools for implementations, upgrades, business process improvement, data conversion, and custom integration for JD Edwards, Oracle and PeopleSoft ERP systems.

Financial Reporting Services GL Associates offers financial systems services remediation for management reporting, financial compliance, closing cycle and chart of accounts alignment for global enterprises using Sap, Oracle, JD Edwards, PeopleSoft, and Lawson financial systems and third party reporting systems including Business Objects, Cetova, Cognos and Hyperion.

Business Technologies GL Associates works with companies that depend on technology to deliver their products and services to help them plan and execute strategies to build core systems for expanding their markets and improving operations, and to mitigate risk. The company develops and implements custom software that integrates with all leading ERP, CRM and Performance Management systems.

Master Data Management: GL Associates offers automation products and services for the ERP systems Master Data Management lifecycle including data conversion, standardization, synchronization, cleansing, and database consolidation.
